name: You And What Army EP (2012)
description:
Due to demand and your amazing support, we have decided to press a limited amount of CD's of our third EP, self titled 'You And What Army'

**Release date Monday 2nd April**

What do you get?
*Signed Limited Edition 10 Track EP (Only 100 Available)
*Lyrics page & Photo
*Special little gift with every CD

**Track Listing**
1. Into Your Eyes
2. Lucidity
3. Skyline
4. Take The World By Storm
5. Visionary
6. Skyline (Boyinaband Remix)
7. Nebula (Geek Boy Remix)
8. Skyline (Dorincourt Remix)
9. Nebula (Mizuki's Last Chance Remix)
10. Skyline (Rmonik Remix)


***************************************************************************

We just want to say a massive thank you to everyone who have supported us and wanted to buy this CD, people like you keep bands like us independent and able to carry on financially. We put all the money the band raises back into the band, so your support is vital to us being able to gig, tour and bring out new stuff!

name: Limited Edition signed CD + Wristband Bundle
description:
Bundle Package 

• YOU AND WHAT ARMY EP (2012)
limited edition, signed CD 
Tracklist:

Skyline
Lucidity
Into Your Eyes
Take the World By Storm
Visionary

+ 5 Remixes from Boyinaband, Geek Boy , Dorincourt, Mizuki's Last Chance and Rmonik.
  
                  AND

• A You And What Army Wristband
silicone wristband
3/4inch 
debossed, ink filled
available in black or white

Official release date: Monday 2nd April
*all pre-sales receive this package 3 days earlier than release date
